p: Carvone (44.5-95.9%) and limonene (1.5-51.3%) have been reported as the main components of C. carvi EO. The other constituents include β-myrcene (0-0.4%), trans-dihydrochalcone (0-0.5%), trans-caveolae (0-0.2%), α-pinene, sabinene, n-octanal, trans-β-ocimene, and γ-terpinene. Additionally, cuminaldehyde (22.08%), c-terpinene (17.86%), c-terpinene-7-al (15.41%), p-cymene (7.99%), myristicin, and dillapiol have been identified as the important constituents of C. carvi EO [ 21 , 30 , 31 ].
